string.text: %s are required by Spooner to install basic equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
Hey, can I ask you a favour? If you are interested in helping me out, I will tell you what I need.
I need tools from a %s. It should contain everything I need to tune equipment. If you can bring one back for me I will be grateful, I will even pay you for it.
Great! You brought exactly what I've asked. Thanks.
%s are required by Spooner to install advanced equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
Alright, If you are up for it, I need more tools. But they may be a bit harder to find. Can you do this for me?
I need an %s. It should contain what I need. If you can bring one back for me I will be grateful, I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
Great! Come back any time if you need me to take a look at your gear.
%s are required by Spooner to install expert equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
Alright, If you are up for it, I need more tools. But they may be a bit harder to find. Can you do this for me?
I need an %s. It should contain what I need. If you can bring one back for me I will be grateful, I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
Great! Come back any time if you need me to take a look at your gear.
